resources.string: Sample using RxPermissions, in this example we are requesting for the \"CALL_PHONE\" request in order to make a phone call directly from the app.
RxPermissions is using the RxJava library for making permession requests and checks with less boilerplate code and more reactive way.
Enter the number you wish to call
RxBinding is library for handling UI events. It turns UI events into RxJava observables, which reduce the code load, no need for using listeners and handlers. Just use Binding.
Sample using RxBinding, in this example we simply binded our TextView with the input from EditText.
